pages.title: Prospecting
pages.text: The Prospector's Pick (Recipe Shown Above) is a useful tool after you've been rummaging around underground for long enough. This tool is made with a decent amount of iron, and can be used in a few ways to help you detect and find other ore plutons.

When held, this tool shows you how many meters away you are above/below sea level. This can be used in conjunction with this book to help you determine how much deeper you'll need to go. Additionally, when right-clicked above se-level the prospector's pick will inform you if there's a deposit in your general vicinity, and if so, where. Once you're underground, it'll scan a configurable area (5x5x5 by default) in the direction you're looking and tell you what you might find.
